Hosting Your Site on Github Using Jekyll

May 15, 2013

Some days ago I decided to create my personal site, I was thinking on what CMS should I use for it and given that most of the times I try to adopt and try new technologies when I get into a new project, I decided to use a something new for me this time.

Since I had been working a lot with WordPress, I decided that this time I would use jekyll, which seems very popular, simple and can be hosted for free on GitHub.
